Process prompts in parallel chunks with error handling and state management

process_future.Rd

Process prompts in parallel chunks with error handling and state management

Usage

process_future(
  chat_obj,
  prompts,
  type_spec = NULL,
  state_path = tempfile("chat_", fileext = ".rds"),
  workers = 4,
  chunk_size = 4,
  plan = "multisession",
  beep = TRUE,
  timeout = 60,
  max_chunk_attempts = 3L,
  max_retries = 3L,
  initial_delay = 1,
  max_delay = 32,
  backoff_factor = 2
)

Arguments

chat_obj

Chat model object for API calls

prompts

Vector or list of prompts to process

type_spec

Optional type specification for structured data extraction

state_path

Path to save intermediate state

workers

Number of parallel workers (default: 4)

chunk_size

Number of prompts per chunk (default: 4)

plan

Parallel backend: "multisession" or "multicore"

beep

Play sound on completion/error (default: TRUE)

timeout

Maximum seconds per prompt (default: 60)

max_chunk_attempts

Maximum retries per failed chunk (default: 3)

max_retries

Maximum retries per prompt (default: 3)

initial_delay

Initial delay before first retry (default: 1)

max_delay

Maximum delay between retries (default: 32)

backoff_factor

Delay multiplier after each retry (default: 2)

Value

Batch results object containing processed responses
